text: 2.9: Ro 2.17; 2 Ko 11.14-15; 1 T 6.18; Ze 2.5; VB 3.9Gu nden hi simtɨgi gu zaagi, gu nta kaŋgi. Gu vhɨra nde kaŋgi, nde guigira fhɨrgerɨgap ki. Nde vhɨra guigira bigi vhɨrve ki. Gu gumgi mbari nde nzɨɨv nde nzuai buni mbari, gu nta kaŋgi. Mba gumgi khaŋ nzuai, “Nza Zudaiŋ ma.” Mbe Zudaiŋ fhuvara. Zakɨra fhuvara! Mbe Satan ntɨɨri ma. 2.9 Kha nuiana bigi, mbe Smerna siosan ki gumgi gu mbigi, mbe bigi sosuagiap, mbe guigira bigi ki fhuv gumgi fara muuŋgiap ki. Mbe Fhe Bakɨmen Ŋina Ŋaarar bigi, mbe guigira tuktɨgap, mbe bigi vhɨrve guarira ki.
